sentences.en: ...a walk along the ramparts of the Old City.
sentences.cn: ...一次沿着老城的土城墙的漫步。

sentences.en: A mole can undermine the strongest rampart.
sentences.cn: 一只田鼠能毁坏最坚固的堡垒.

sentences.en: At last, break down green rampart of international trade.
sentences.cn: 依据国际标准,培植绿色企业;研究国际绿色认证标准发展动态, 打破绿色贸易壁垒.

sentences.en: If you desire money, store it at the Dwarven Treasury in a Rampart.
sentences.cn: 如果你渴望财富的话,把你的钱存到壁垒城的矮人金库中吧.

sentences.en: Johnston did stand like an iron rampart in the mountains above Dalton, one hundred miles away.
sentences.cn: 约翰斯顿的确像一堵铜墙铁壁屹立在多尔顿以北一百英里的山区.

sentences.en: Parapet applies to any low fortification, typically a wall atop a rampart.
sentences.cn: Parapet指低矮的防御工事, 典型的是壁垒上的墙.

sentences.en: Patented technology, remarkable rampart, protection by law, more reliable forgery prevention.
sentences.cn: 专利技术, 壁垒显著,法律保护, 防伪更可靠.

sentences.en: Perhaps the tower is part of the rampart of the city.
sentences.cn: 这城楼或许就是城墙的一部分。

sentences.en: They had been the great rampart of the colony on the North.
sentences.cn: 他们一向是北部殖民地的坚强保垒.

sentences.en: To our right rose the high rampart of the dunes.
sentences.cn: 我们的右边是高耸的沙丘.

sentences.en: Were we in a tin cup on top of a busted rampart.
sentences.cn: 我们是否在坍塌墙顶的一只锡杯中呆过.

sentences.en: Which is the longest rampart in the world?
sentences.cn: 世界上最长的城墙是 什么 ?

sentences.en: Yes, an iron rampart, " he repeated, relishing his phrase.
sentences.cn: 是的, 就是铜墙铁壁, " 他很欣赏自己用的这个字眼,又重复了一遍.

trans.tran_cn: （城堡等周围宽阔的）防御土墙，防御，保护
trans.tran_en: a wide pile of earth or a stone wall built to protect a castle or city in the past
